enhancedTranslationSystem.title: Enhanced Translation System
enhancedTranslationSystem.description: Complete Czech language support with improved tennis terminology and better user experience across all pages.

advancedPointLogging.title: Advanced Point Logging
advancedPointLogging.description: Detailed point-by-point tracking with serve types, return analytics, and rally patterns for comprehensive match analysis.

improvedMatchStatistics.title: Improved Match Statistics
improvedMatchStatistics.description: Enhanced statistics display with better quality assessment ratings and more intuitive performance metrics.

componentQualityFixes.title: Component Quality Fixes
componentQualityFixes.description: Resolved various UI inconsistencies and improved component reliability across the application.
